channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Email Newsletter Team - FluentCRM -- Fluent CRM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Email Newsletter Team - FluentCRM -- Fluent CRM

item.title: CVE-2024-30430|2024-06-19T14:30:42.866Z -- wp%20email%20newsletter%20team%20-%20fluentcrm -- fluent%20crm
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Email Newsletter Team - FluentCRM Fluent CRM allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Fluent CRM: from n/a through 2.8.44.
